question.xref: DES s8, HC p108, KYTS p10
question.text: You should reduce your speed when driving along this road because

explanation.text: Traffic could be turning off ahead of you, to the left or right. Vehicles turning left will be slowing down before the junction and any vehicles turning right may have to stop to allow oncoming traffic to clear. Be prepared for this as you might have to slow down or stop behind them.

answer.text: there is a staggered junction ahead
there is a low bridge ahead
there is a change in the road surface
